#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main(void) {
  int tc, cap, men, women, children, saved_men, saved_women, saved_children;

  scanf("%d", &tc);
  while(tc--) {
    scanf("%d%d%d%d", &cap, &men, &women, &children);
    saved_children=min(children, cap*4/5);
    saved_men=men;
    saved_women=min(saved_men*2, women);
    saved_children=min(saved_children, (saved_men+saved_women)*4);
    cap-=saved_children;
    saved_women=min(women, cap*2/3);
    saved_women=min(saved_women, men*2);
    cap-=saved_women;
    saved_men=min(men, cap);
    printf("%d %d %d\n", saved_men, saved_women, saved_children);
  }
  return 0;
}
